context_of_use: The admin accesses the system to view sales reports for monitoring business performance.
description: Allow admins to access sales reports and dashboards to monitor business performance.
triggering_event: Admin requests to view sales reports.
preconditions: Admin is logged into the system.
Admin has the necessary permissions to view sales reports.
postconditions: Sales reports are displayed to the admin.
Admin can analyze the data presented in the reports.
assumptions: The system has up-to-date sales data available for reporting.
The admin has the required access rights.
requirements_met: The system must provide access to sales reports.
The system must ensure data accuracy in reports.
main_flow: 1. Admin requests to view sales reports → System displays the sales reports.
alternative_flows: AF-1 (from Step 1): Admin filters reports by date range → System updates the displayed reports accordingly.
exception_flows: EF-1 (from Step 1): Admin does not have permission → System displays an error message indicating insufficient permissions.
information_for_steps: 2. Sales data retrieved from the database.
